subject: Re: Proposal for a new CDD sub-project: Debian4Business
body:
Qua, 2007-04-18 às 20:53 +0200, RalfGesellensetter escreveu:
> Am Mittwoch 18 April 2007 17:07 schrieb Luis Matos:
> > A cdd would be good for some first testing, but having it included in
> > debian would be great.
> 
> Dear Luis,
> 
> being involved in the Debian-Edu CDD project, I regard your suggestion 
> as interesting. First thing to do is mabe to find a (yet unused) well 
> sounding project name.
> 
> Debian-Business or Debian-Office (official)
> How about deBiz, debice, ...
debiz sounds good.

what are your plans?
> 
> Regards
> Ralf
> 
> 


--

with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
